QuestData.Title: Rodent Removal
QuestData.Description:
<The weapon buzzes with a dark, static energy. Whatever this Mawsworn was testing, it appears to have been somewhat successful on the nearby rodents.
Further investigation may yield additional information.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Test the Tormentor's Rod on $1oa Giant Mawrats in The Beastwarrens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver news of your discovery to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Serves them right for leaving this unattended.
I am sure we can find other uses for it.
